Ability.Name: Soothing Mist
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------------- -- SOOTHING MIST -- ------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_SoothingMist_enable then if GetUnitSpeed("player") == 0 then local target, HP = OM_HealTarget() if HP <= PQI_SINMistweaver_SoothingMist_value or UnitAffectingCombat("player") and not OM_CanCast(100780, "target") and UnitPowerMax("player", 12) - 1 > UnitPower("player", 12) then if not OM_UnitBuffSpecial(target, 115175) then OM_SpecialCast(115175, target) end else OM_StopCast(115175) end end
end

Ability.Name: Fortifying Brew
Ability.Lua:
-- --------------------- -- FORTIFYING BREW -- --------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_FortifyingBrew_enable then
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
if OM_UnitHP("player") <= PQI_SINMistweaver_FortifyingBrew_value then OM_Cast(115203) if GetItemCount(5512, nil, true) > 0 and GetItemCooldown(5512) == 0 then UseItemByName(GetItemSpell(5512)) end end
end
end

Ability.Name: - Stance / Buffs
Ability.Lua:
-- -------------------- -- STANCE / BUFFS -- --------------------
if GetShapeshiftForm() ~= 1 then CastShapeshiftForm(1) end
if not UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
if not GetRaidBuffTrayAuraInfo(1) then CancelUnitBuff("player", OM_convert(115921)) OM_Cast(115921, "player") end
end

Ability.Name: Surging Mist
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------------ -- SURGING MIST -- ------------------ if PQI_SINMistweaver_SurgingMist_enable then
local target, HP = OM_HealTarget() if HP <= PQI_SINMistweaver_SurgingMist_value then if UnitChannelInfo("player") == OM_convert(115175) and UnitPower("player", 12) < UnitPowerMax("player", 12) and OM_UnitBuffSpecial(target, 115175) then OM_SpecialCast(116694, target) end if OM_UnitBuffCount("player", 118674) == 5 then OM_SpecialCast(116694, target) end elseif OM_UnitBuffCount("player", 118674) == 5 then OM_SpecialCast(116694, target) else OM_StopCast(116694) end
end

Ability.Name: Expel Harm
Ability.Lua:
-- ---------------- -- EXPEL HARM -- ---------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_ExpelHarm_enable then
if OM_UnitHP("player") <= PQI_SINMistweaver_ExpelHarm_value then OM_Cast(115072, "player") end
end

Ability.Name: Renewing Mist
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------------- -- RENEWING MIST -- ------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_RenewingMist_enable then
local OM_roster = OM_roster for i = 1, #OM_roster do if not UnitBuff(OM_roster[i].unit, OM_convert(115151), nil, "PLAYER") and OM_UnitHP(OM_roster[i].unit) <= PQI_SINMistweaver_RenewingMist_value then OM_Cast(115151, OM_roster[i].unit) end end
end

Ability.Name: Enveloping Mist
Ability.Lua:
-- --------------------- -- ENVELOPING MIST -- --------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_EnvelopingMist_enable then
local target, HP = OM_HealTarget() if HP <= PQI_SINMistweaver_EnvelopingMist_value then if UnitChannelInfo("player") == OM_convert(115175) and UnitPower("player", 12) >= 3 and OM_UnitBuffSpecial(target, 115175) and not UnitBuff(target, OM_convert(124682), nil, "PLAYER") then OM_SpecialCast(124682, target) end else OM_StopCast(124682) end
end

Ability.Name: Life Cocoon
Ability.Lua:
-- ----------------- -- LIFE COCOON -- ----------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_LifeCocoon_enable then
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
local target, HP, role = OM_HealTarget() local InstanceInfo = { GetInstanceInfo() } if HP <= PQI_SINMistweaver_LifeCocoon_value and not UnitBuff(target, OM_convert(116849)) and UnitAffectingCombat(target) and not OM_CastImmune(target) and role ~= "PET" and (OM_HasThreat(target) or InstanceInfo[2] == "arena") then OM_Cast(116849, target) end
end
end

Ability.Name: Detox
Ability.Lua:
-- ----------- -- DETOX -- ----------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_DetoxTarget_enable then
local function DoNotDispel(unit) local DoNotDispel = { 30108, --Unstable Affliction 34914, --Vampiric Touch } for i = 1, #DoNotDispel do if UnitDebuff(unit, OM_convert(DoNotDispel[i])) then return 1 else return nil end end end
local function dispel(unit) for i = 1, 40 do local debuff = { UnitDebuff(unit, i) } if UnitCanAssist("player", unit) and debuff[1] and not DoNotDispel(unit) then if debuff[5] == "Magic" or debuff[5] == "Poison" or debuff[5] == "Disease" then OM_Cast(115450, unit) end end end end
local unit = { "mouseover", "target", "focus", "auto", }
if PQI_SINMistweaver_DetoxTarget_value == 4 then for i = 1, #OM_roster do dispel(OM_roster[i].unit) end else dispel(unit[PQI_SINMistweaver_DetoxTarget_value]) end
end

Ability.Name: Mistweaver (Passive)
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------- -- PASSIVE -- -------------
----------------- -- AUTO-ATTACK -- ----------------- if OM_CanCast(100780) then if not IsCurrentSpell(OM_convert(6603)) then AttackTarget() end else StopAttack() end
if UnitPower("player", 12) == UnitPowerMax("player", 12) or UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(139598)) then ------------------- -- BLACKOUT KICK -- ------------------- if not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(127722)) then local spell, unit = 100784, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end end end
--------- -- JAB -- --------- if UnitPower("player", 12) < UnitPowerMax("player", 12) and not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(127722)) and not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(139598)) then local spell, unit = 100780, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end end

Ability.Name: Revival
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------- -- REVIVAL -- ------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_Revival_enable then
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
local function OM_RevivalTargets() local targets = 0 local OM_roster = OM_roster for i = 1, #OM_roster do if OM_roster[i].role ~= "PET" then if OM_roster[i].hp <= PQI_SINMistweaver_Revival_value then targets = targets + 1 end end end return targets end
if OM_RevivalTargets() >= PQI_SINMistweaver_RevivalTargets_value then OM_SpecialCast(115310, "player") end
end
end

Ability.Name: Level 30 Talent
Ability.Lua:
-- --------------------- -- LEVEL 30 TALENT -- --------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_Level30Talent_enable then
local spell = OM_TalentOption(2) or 0 local OM_roster = OM_roster
for i = 1, #OM_roster do if OM_roster[i].role == "TANK" and OM_UnitHP(OM_roster[i].unit) <= PQI_SINMistweaver_Level30Talent_value and not UnitBuff(OM_roster[i].unit, OM_TalentOption(2), nil, "PLAYER") then OM_Cast(spell, OM_roster[i].unit) end end
if OM_UnitHP(OM_roster[1].unit) <= PQI_SINMistweaver_Level30Talent_value and not UnitBuff(OM_roster[1].unit, spell, nil, "PLAYER") then OM_Cast(spell, OM_roster[1].unit) end
end

Ability.Name: Spinning Crane Kick
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------------------- -- SPINNING CRANE KICK -- ------------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_SpinningCraneKick_enable then
local function OM_SpinningCraneKickTargets() local count = 0 local OM_roster = OM_roster for i = 1, #OM_roster do if OM_roster[i].hp <= PQI_SINMistweaver_SpinningCraneKick_value then if CheckInteractDistance(OM_roster[i].unit, 3) then count = count + 1 end end end return count end
if GetSpellCooldown(OM_convert(115151)) ~= 0 and UnitPower("player", 12) < UnitPowerMax("player", 12) then if OM_SpinningCraneKickTargets() >= 6 then OM_SpecialCast(101546, "player") end end
end

Ability.Name: Healing Sphere
Ability.Lua:
-- -------------------- -- HEALING SPHERE -- -------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_HealingSphere_enable then
if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_SINMistweaver_HealingSphere_key) then OM_AECast(115460, "player") end
end

Ability.Name: - Pause -
Ability.Lua:
-- ----------- -- PAUSE -- -----------
if IsMounted() or UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(105590)) --drink or UnitChannelInfo("player") == OM_convert(115176) --zen or UnitChannelInfo("player") == OM_convert(117952) --crack or UnitChannelInfo("player") == OM_convert(115867) --manatea or (PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_SINMistweaver_PAUSE_key) and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus()) then return true end

Ability.Name: Mana Tea / On Use
Ability.Lua:
-- if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
-------------- -- MANA TEA -- -------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_ManaTea_enable then
local ManaTeaCount = GetSpellCount(OM_convert(115294)) if ManaTeaCount >= 2 and OM_UnitMP("player") <= PQI_SINMistweaver_ManaTea_value then OM_Cast(115294, "player") elseif ManaTeaCount == 1 then if UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(64904)) or OM_UnitMP("player") <= 25 then OM_Cast(115294, "player") end end
end
------------ -- ON USE -- ------------ if PQI_SINMistweaver_OnUse_enable then
if OM_UnitMP("player") <= PQI_SINMistweaver_OnUse_value then local ItemSlot = { 13, 14, 10 } for i = 1, #ItemSlot do local ItemID = GetInventoryItemID("player", ItemSlot[i]) if GetItemSpell(ItemID) and GetItemSpell(ItemID) ~= "PvP Trinket" and GetItemCooldown(ItemID) == 0 then UseItemByName(ItemID) end end end
end
end

Ability.Name: Jade Serpent Statue
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------------------- -- JADE SERPENT STATUE -- ------------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_JadeSerpentStatue_enable then
if PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_SINMistweaver_JadeSerpentStatue_key) then OM_AECast(115313, "player") end
end

Ability.Name: Fistweaver (Active)
Ability.Lua:
-- ------------ -- ACTIVE -- ------------
-------------------- -- TOUCH OF DEATH -- -------------------- local spell, unit = 115080, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then if not UnitPlayerControlled(unit) then if UnitHealth(unit) <= UnitHealth("player") then OM_Cast(spell, target) end end end
------------- -- DISABLE -- ------------- local spell, unit = 116095, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then if UnitPlayerControlled(unit) then if not OM_SnareImmune(unit) and (GetUnitSpeed(unit) > 0 or GetUnitSpeed("player") > 0) and not UnitDebuff(unit, OM_convert(spell)) then OM_Cast(spell, target) end end end
----------------- -- AUTO-ATTACK -- ----------------- if OM_CanCast(100780) then if not IsCurrentSpell(OM_convert(6603)) then AttackTarget() end else StopAttack() end
-------------- -- CHI WAVE -- -------------- if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
local spell, unit = 115098, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end
end
if UnitPower("player", 12) == UnitPowerMax("player", 12) or UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(139598)) then ------------------- -- BLACKOUT KICK -- ------------------- if not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(127722)) then local spell, unit = 100784, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end else ---------------- -- TIGER PALM -- ---------------- local spell, unit = 100787, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end end end
--------- -- JAB -- --------- if UnitPower("player", 12) < UnitPowerMax("player", 12) and (not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(139598)) or not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(127722))) then local spell, unit = 100780, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end end

Ability.Name: - PQI -
Uplift / Thunder Focus Tea
Ability.Lua:
-- -------------------------------- -- UPLIFT / THUNDER FOCUS TEA -- -------------------------------- local function OM_RenewingMistTargets() local targets = 0 local OM_roster = OM_roster for i = 1, #OM_roster do if OM_roster[i].hp <= PQI_SINMistweaver_Uplift_value and UnitBuff(OM_roster[i].unit, OM_convert(115151), nil, "PLAYER") then targets = targets + 1 end end return targets end
----------------------- -- THUNDER FOCUS TEA -- ----------------------- if PQI_SINMistweaver_ThunderFocusTea_enable then
if UnitAffectingCombat("player") then
if not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(116680)) and OM_RenewingMistTargets() >= PQI_SINMistweaver_ThunderFocusTea_value then OM_Cast(116680, "player") end
end
end
------------ -- UPLIFT -- ------------ if PQI_SINMistweaver_Uplift_enable then
if OM_CooldownRemains(115151) <= 5 and UnitPower("player", 12) >= 2 then if OM_RenewingMistTargets() >= PQI_SINMistweaver_UpliftTargets_value then OM_SpecialCast(116670, "player") end end
end

Ability.Name: - Event: SoO -
Ability.Lua: -- ----------- Immerseus if UnitExists("target") and UnitName("target") == "Contaminated Puddle" then OM_AddToRoster("target", 40, "PRIORITY") end

Ability.Name: - Force Heal -
Ability.Lua:
-- if PQI_SINMistweaver_ForceHealTarget_enable and PQI:IsHotkeys(PQI_SINMistweaver_ForceHeal_key) then
local unit = { "mouseover", "target", "focus", } --PQR_WriteToChat(unit[PQI_SINMistweaver_ForceHeal_value]) OM_AddToRoster(unit[PQI_SINMistweaver_ForceHealTarget_value], PQI_SINMistweaver_FakeLife_value, "PRIORITY") end

Ability.Name: - OM Pre -
Ability.Lua:
-- if not IsAddOnLoaded("PQInterface") then PQR_WriteToChat("PQInterface Addon Required.", "ERROR") PQR_StopRotation() end
if UnitIsDeadOrGhost("player") or not HasFullControl() then return true end
local file = { { lua = "PQR_OM.lua", force = false }, { lua = "PQR_OM_LineOfSight.lua", force = true }, { lua = "PQR_OM_HealBot.lua", force = true }, } for i = 1, #file do local lua, force = file[i].lua, file[i].force PQR_LoadLua(lua, force) if PQR_LoadLua(lua) == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Failed to load, " .. lua .. ", update this profile from PQR.", "ERROR") PQR_StopRotation() end end

Ability.Name: - OM Post -
Ability.Lua:
-- OM_SortRoster()
local target, HP, role = OM_HealTarget() --PQR_WriteToChat(UnitName(OM_HealTarget()) .. " (" .. role .. ")" .. " HP: " .. HP)

Ability.Name: Legendary Gem
Ability.Lua: -- if UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(137331)) then --------- -- JAB -- --------- if not UnitBuff("player", OM_convert(139598)) then local spell, unit = 100780, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end else ---------------- -- TIGER PALM -- ---------------- local spell, unit = 100787, "target" if OM_CanCast(spell, unit) then OM_Cast(spell, unit) end end return true end

Ability.Name: - Event: PG -
Ability.Lua:
-- ----------- Proving Ground
for i = 1, #OM_roster do local unit = OM_roster[i].unit local debuff = UnitDebuff(unit, 1) if debuff == "Aqua Bomb" then --OM_Cast(115450, unit) elseif debuff == "Chomp" then OM_AddToRoster(unit, 40, "PRIORITY") end end
